channel.title: Tempest - battlescape based
channel.description:
[CENTER] [size=14pt][B]Base:[/B] InnovationX/BattleScape[/size] [B]Note[/B]:[i]I am Flight on R-S.[/i]
Stability isn't great since it's battlescape/innovationx, although innovationx did hold hundreds of players without problems.
Uses martins vbulletin integration so in Server class change information to yours, also has highscore so in DatabaseConnection change info to yours.
It's cleaned a bit and added a few features. It's better than PI I'm sure, if you need help setting it up let me know.
Credit given wherever it needs to be(Palidino, Mrquarter, Damien, COUE etc.).
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/jBhe7.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/Zlg4t.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/7wzdS.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/D8zFo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/WhZK2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yfk2y.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/44dd4.png[/img]
[B]NPC clipping[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YQqKb.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/8bSkl.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/onjIF.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ERex2.png[/img]
[B]Clipped following[/b] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/78t1O.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/LRMwM.png[/img]
+Plenty of people were missing innovationx cache so it's in the package http://up.ht/joO5rU
[i]Rep is appreciated but in no way required.[/i]

item.title: Tempest - battlescape based
item.dc:creator: @Flight Flight
item.description:
@Flight wrote:

Seems the IP is my local IP address, go to client class (client.java) and search “192.168.1.103” without the quotation marks of course, and change it to “127.0.0.1” (again without them). Everyone make sure you’ve set up the database properly, if you need help setting up MySQL look here:

How to install the MySQL Database Server on your Windows PC

Also, the database information in the Server class is the FORUM’s database, which you don’t need sql files for as it connects through the forum, but be aware that you have to change Type.vBulletin in that line to Type.smf/Type.ipb/Type.phpBB if you’re using a forum different from vBulletin.

Then, the database information in DatabaseConnection.java is the highscore database, which I posted 3 posts (?) ago, so download that and run the SQL script in the query browser(google mySql tools query browser if you don’t know how to execute an SQL script).

Any more questions? let me know.

Read full topic

item.title: Tempest - battlescape based
item.dc:creator: @Flight Flight
item.description:
@Flight wrote:

You haven’t moved your cache to C:/.

As for others & not connecting, make sure in Server class you edit the FORUM database information, and in DatabaseConnection you edit the HIGHSCORE database information.

I didn’t release the highscore SQL database so here it is:

http://uppit.com/c6f9anhgdcg9/highscores.rar
